name: Over Speeding
description: Driving above the prescribed speed limit depending on vehicle category and road type.
typicalExamples: Driving at 80 km/h in a 50 km/h zone
Exceeding speed limit in a school zone

name: Drunken Driving
description: Driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
typicalExamples: Driver’s blood-alcohol content above legal limit

name: No Seat Belt
description: Failure to wear a seat belt while driving or sitting in the front seat.

name: Using Mobile While Driving
description: Using a mobile phone or other handheld device while operating a vehicle.
typicalExamples: Holding a phone to take a call while moving

name: Signal Jumping
description: Disobeying traffic lights or signals while driving.

name: No Helmet
description: Riding a two-wheeler without wearing a protective helmet.
typicalExamples: Rider of a bike without helmet
